thebabycareproject

Class Validation

  • java.lang.Object
    • thebabycareproject.Validation

  • public class Validation
extends java.lang.Object
    Used in many controllers. Validates email, password(mainly length), text field as username(mainly length) Email is validated differently for birthday of the child(must be in past) and sending email(must be in future).
